title: After capitalism: 'We will return to the art of discourse'

sources.title: Front without flanks, Part One | WAR DRAMA
sources.description:
Part Two: https://youtu.be/G6FlQJwsLYo

Based on the novel by Semyon Tsvigun "We will return." The beginning of the Great Patriotic War. Major Mlynsky, a former school teacher, behind enemy lines, gathers a special detachment from disparate military groups to actively counter the advancing fascists. Mlynsky manages to establish contact with the front headquarters, and through the local population - with the underground. And the squad begins combat operations.

Year of production: 1974

Director: Gostev Igor
Screenwriter: Dneprov Semyon
Composer: Basner Veniamin
Operator: Kharitonov Alexander
Production designer: Golikov Vasily

Cast: Pereverzev Ivan, Polskikh Galina, Sukhovey Svetlana, Shulgin Victor, Leonov-Gladyshev Evgeniy, Safonov Vsevolod, Samoilov Vladimir, Polyakova Lyudmila, Kuznetsova Vera, Shutov Evgeniy, Zamansky Vladimir, Frorip Jurgen, Tikhonov Vyacheslav, Kormunin Pavel, Ivashov Vladimir, Zhakov Oleg, Soloviev Anatoly, Bibikov Boris, Morozov Semyon, Rozanov Mikhail, Kurkina Raisa, Denisov Alexander, Borzunov Alexey, Mirzoev Tofik, Pitch Harry, Hasse Hanno, Ferapontov Vladimir, Pechnikov Valentin, Lukyanov Alexander, Polishchuk Nikolay, Rudik Nikolay, Yurchenko Boris , Schulze Horst, Mikhail Turchenkov, Valery Strukov
